detail_desc: Jumper knitted in soft cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a zipped pocket in woven fabric on one sleeve, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool decorated with faceted, plastic sparkly stones on the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed finish.

Shorter jumper in a rib knit with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top and long sleeves.
